Keywords: Avengers , Howling Commandos , Invaders , Past , S.H.I.E.L.D. , Soldier
Real Name: Steve Rogers
Team Up
1
TEAM UP: AVENGERS THEMED TEAM: If Captain America is part of the listed themed team, friendly characters with the Avengers keyword have Avengers Initiative team ability.
Special Powers
THOSE WHO OPPOSE HIS SHIELD MUST YIELD: Energy Shield/Deflection, Leadership.

Comments
November 14, 2022
spider_ham
The best standard version of Steve Rogers in the 60+ point range. His Team Up effect provides a giant boost to older Avengers designs lacking Stealth-busting (and improved movement under older rules).
November 14, 2022
CaptainAmerica1945
I was looking over the various Captain America's we've gotten over the past few years and despite being a common I rather like this piece; traited leadership and Energy Deflection are abilities Cap should have. Outwit is a nice touch that we've seen from time to time and I look forward to trying him out with Bucky and with both there team ups. In regards to the dial I wish they would have given him one more thing, like precision strike traited or even on his dial from click 1-8. This piece has lot going for it and perhaps I wish it just had a little more like the Bucky; in many ways it reminds me of a longer not as powerful version of the Time Gem one. Just an idea but after looking at all the pumps and dumps for this set what if wizkids made characters/pieces that had alternative dials so to as if something happens in game or completing an objective they change-- so for leaders/field commanders reacting/reactions as if changing tactics but that is just an idea I've been pondering for some time. Mission points, opponent's objects, being able to make it across the map and be in your opponent's set up area, KO'ing an opponent's character etc. Similar to field conditions or in game affect/effects that change/alter/de-power/power up your character.
November 8, 2022
Novashotgunner
Nothing flashy or fancy just a Steve Rogers who gets the job done. The throwback reference to the old 60's cap show with his trait text is hilarious. He's not the perfect soldier, but a good man.
October 24, 2022
Oathful
Solid Cap right here. His 90 point line isn't bad, but for 10 points more I'd probably run the Empyre SR. His 45 point line is where I like him best, ticks all the boxes for a good leadership/secondary attacker. Depending on if they go back and give keywords to the Disney+ and older equipment, Soldier-Serum would be nice on him, and if they give Redwing the Soldier keyword I'd run that because I really like that bystander. // Thematic: 8/10, Viability: 9/10, Fun Factor: 8.5/10, fairly balanced fun.
